name: branch
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: branch
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: Immunology is a branch of biological science.
example.egtrans: 免疫学是生物科学的一个分支。

example.eg: One branch of their family (= one group of relatives) emigrated to Brazil.
example.egtrans: 他们家族的一支移居到了巴西。

example.eg: In the US, the president is part of the executive branch of the government.
example.egtrans: 在美国，总统是政府行政分支的一部分。

trans_examp.trans_en: one of the offices or groups that form part of a large business organization
trans_examp.trans_cn: 分支机构；分部；分行；分店

example.eg: I used to work in the local branch of a large bank.
example.egtrans: 我曾在一家大型银行设在当地的分行工作。

example.eg: Take the forms into your local branch office.
example.egtrans: 把这些表格带到你们的地方分部。

dsense.name: branch
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: one of the parts of a tree that grows out from the main trunk and has leaves, flowers, or fruit on it

example.egtrans: 光秃秃／叶子茂密／开满花的树枝

example.eg: The fruit on the lower branches was protected from the sun.
example.egtrans: 下边树枝上的果子见不到阳光。

dsense.name: branch
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a part of a river or road that leaves the main part

example.eg: This branch of the river eventually empties into the Atlantic.
example.egtrans: 大河的这条支流最终注入大西洋。

dsense.name: branch
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a smaller blood vessel or nerve that grows out of the main part

name: branch
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: branch
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The top of the tree had been cut off to encourage it to branch (out) lower down.
example.egtrans: 树冠已被砍去，目的是为了促使它从下面抽出新枝。

dsense.name: branch
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The road branches at the bottom of the hill.
